name: Meet Me in The Shadows
description:
Meet Me in The Shadows is a turn based strategy game where Light is your Enemy. It is a submission for the annual Game Makers Toolkit Jam and most of the assets are handdrawn. The game is inspired by a board game I played as a kid, that's the reason why I chose this hand-drawn style. 

You control a group of Shadow Fairies. Each turn you can sneakily move behind the trees. When a fairy is struck by the light, she freezes and must wait until she is rescued by another fairy. Once all fairies gather together under a tree you complete the scene.

Controls:

Left Mouse: Select
Right Mouse: Deselect
Middle Mouse: Rotate
